text: Devon Edward Sawa (born September 7, 1978) is a Canadian actor. He is known for his horror roles in the movie Final Destination and in the USA Network & Syfy horror series Chucky. He also played the title character of the Eminem music video "Stan" and played Owen Elliot in The CW action spy drama series Nikita. Sawa was born on September 7, 1978 in Vancouver, Canada. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Devon Sawa
